comments.body: Can some of these helper types be imported from `../..`?  Can `Locale` be generic (e.g. `declare const locale: Locale<"af">`)?

The code genned types are stricter than the Locale declared within the root `index.d.ts` file. For example look at `locale/af/index.d.ts` vs `locales/en/index.d.ts`.

I did however move all the duplicated types to `/locale/index.d.ts` and imported them where needed from there. This deletes the unnecessary duplication of `Duration`, `Tense`, and `Quantify` types within the code genned files. See aa61b4f
